mode.title: System Mode
mode.description: Operating mode for the device. Defaults is 'active'.

message.description: A human-readable one-line description of the entry

detail.description: An optional extensive entry which can include more detail, e.g. a complete program stack-trace

category.description: A device-specific representation of the category an entry pertains to

timestamp.description: Timestamp the condition was triggered, or most recently updated

level.description: The status `level` should conform to the numerical [Stackdriver LogEntry](https://cloud.google.com/logging/docs/reference/v2/rest/v2/LogEntry#logseverity) levels. The `DEFAULT` value of 0 is not allowed (lowest value is 100, maximum 800).
